```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(shiny)
library(plotly)
library(feather)
library(dplyr)


df <- read_feather("data/allCranLogs.feather")
print(glimpse(df))
pkgs <- read_csv("data/packages.csv")

(glimpse(pkgs))

packageChoice <- sort(unique(df$package))


```


Individual Packages
===================================== 

Inputs {.sidebar data-width=250}
-------------------------------------

``` {r}
includeMarkdown("info.md")
hr()
selectInput("packages_Ind","Select",choices=packageChoice,selected="dplyr", multiple=FALSE, selectize=FALSE, size = 10)

```

Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Daily Downloads 

```{r}


renderPlotly({
  df %>%
  filter(package == input$packages_Ind & count > 0) %>%
  plot_ly(
  x = date,
  y = count,
  mode = "markers",
  color = "#00ffed",
  hoverinfo = "text",
  text = paste0(date, "<br> Rank: ", rank, "<br> Count: ", count)
  )  %>%
 
  layout(hovermode = "closest",
             xaxis=list(title=""),
             yaxis=list(title=" "
             )
  )
  })


```

Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Package

```{r}

renderText({
  
paste0(input$packages_Ind," - ",pkgs[pkgs$name==input$packages_Ind,]$description)
  
})

```

### Rank

```{r}

renderPlotly({
df %>% 
  filter(package %in% input$packages_Ind&count>0) %>% 
  plot_ly(x=date,y=rank,mode="markers", color=package)  %>% 
    layout(
           xaxis=list(title=""),
           yaxis=list(autorange="reversed",title="")
           
    ) 
})
```
